sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-form class="px-4 mt-3">
        <v-text-field
            v-model="localRazaoSocial"
            label="RazÃ£o Social"
            prepend-icon="mdi-clock-time-four-outline"
        />
        <v-text-field
            v-model="cnpj"
            label="Cnpj"
            prepend-icon="mdi-clock-time-four-outline"
        />
        <v-text-field
            v-model="telefone"
            label="Telefone"
            prepend-icon="mdi-clock-time-four-outline"
        />
        <v-text-field
            v-model="email"
            label="Email"
            prepend-icon="mdi-clock-time-four-outline"
        />
        <!-- Campo Feito Para Salvar uma foto no banco -->
        <v-row class="px-3 py-7">
            <v-btn
                outlined
                large
                block
                color="green"
                @click="Salvar()"
                >
                Confirmar
            </v-btn>
        </v-row>
        <load-component :Ativo="loader"/>
    </v-form>
</template>
<script>

import api from '@/services/api';
import LoadComponent from '../LoadComponent.vue'

export default {
    components: { LoadComponent },

    name: 'CadastroEmpresaComponent',

    data: () => ({
        loader: false,
        localRazaoSocial: '',
        localCpfCnpj: '',
        localTelefone: '',
        localEmail: '',
        localEnderecoId: '',
        localConfiguracoesmpresaId: '',
        localDataCadastro: ''
    }),
    methods: {
        Salvar() {
            this.loader = !this.loader;

            api.put('Empresa', {
                Id: 6,
                Nome: this.razaoSocial,
                CpfCnpj: this.cnpj,
                Telefone: this.telefone,
                Email: this.email,
                EnderecoId: this.enderecoId,
                ConfiguracoesEmpresaId: this.configuracoesEmpresaId,
                DataCadastro: new Date().toISOString()
            })
            .then(response => {
                this.$emit('response', { success: true, response: response })
            })
            .catch(error => {
                this.$emit('response', { success: false, response: error })
            })
            .finally(() => (this.loader = !this.loader))
        }
    },
    watch: {
        razaoSocial(val) {
            debugger
            this.localRazaoSocial = val
        }
    },
    props: {
        razaoSocial: String,
        cnpj: String,
        telefone: String,
        email: String,
        enderecoId: Number,
        configuracoesEmpresaId: Number
    }
}
</script>
<style>
    
</style>
